    Open message settings

    After you create a Message field you can customize its message to display.

    • Choose: Administration ( in the top panel on the right) > Issues.

    • Select: Fields > Custom Fields.

    • Find your field and click Actions > Configure.

    • Click Edit JBCF:Message field in field context.

    In the opened window you can customize the text and display of the message for the selected context. One field can have several contexts, and for each of them you can set your own message.
